sources.title: Sanshiro Sugata Part Two
sources.description: Kurosawa’s first film was such a success that the studio leaned on the director to make a sequel. The result is a hugely entertaining adventure, reuniting most of the major players from the original and featuring a two-part narrative in which Sanshiro first fights a pair of Americans and then finds himself the target of a revenge mission undertaken by the brothers of the original film’s villain.

metadata.Plot: In this government-suggested sequel, Sugata again grows as a judo master, and demonstrates his (and by extension, all Japanese) superiority to the foreign warrior.
metadata.Actors: Denjirô Ôkôchi, Susumu Fujita, Ryûnosuke Tsukigata
